mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectInfMailTrnsmisResultCd Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ CD , BOUNCE_NM , EXPLN , SECSEN_YN FROM INF_MAIL_TRNSMIS_RESULT_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND CD = #{cd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteInfMailTrnsmisResultCd Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM INF_MAIL_TRNSMIS_RESULT_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND CD = #{cd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
